text:
Kendall Jenner and her rumored boyfriend, Blake Griffin, recently watched a comedy show organized by the Los Angeles Clippers in Hollywood.

After the successful event that was put together by Griffin, the two were spotted talking and walking hand in hand outdoors. Jenner kept warm by wearing Griffin’s jacket throughout the rest of the night.

“Kendall was there supporting Blake. She arrived at The Avalon a few minutes before the show started and greeted several of Blake’s friends. She seemed to know them well and they all stood around chatting,” the source told E! News.

Jenner and Griffin were first linked to each other in August. But until today, the two have not yet confirmed the real status of their relationship. Every now and then, the rumored couple has been spotted at various public outings.

For instance, Jenner attended one of Griffin’s basketball games recently. The “Keeping Up With the Kardashians” star and the professional athlete has also enjoyed lunch and dinner dates together.

A source told US Weekly last month that even though the two have not yet confirmed that they’re dating, they already have been a couple since October. “They’re legit. They’re a full-on couple. Kendall has been going to a lot of his games and they have been enjoying time at home when Blake is in town. They’re good,” the source said.

Jenner and her younger sister, Kylie Jenner, also went on a double date with Griffin and Travis Scott on Oct. 15 at the Universal Studios’ Halloween Horror Nights.

“Kylie and Kendall were both really loving and cuddly with their boyfriends. Both couples were almost always holding hands or had their arms around each other,” an insider said.

Earlier last month, Jenner was once again spotted at one of Griffin’s games in Los Angeles. The rumored couple was seen hanging out by the bleachers, and they also mingled with their friends separately.

“Kendall is very happy with Blake. They started out more like friends, and then it was very casual. But it seems more serious lately. When they are not together, they keep in touch over the phone. Her family has accepted Blake. They are spending time getting to know him,” another insider told People.
title: Kendall Jenner Wears Rumored Boyfriend Blake Griffin’s Jacket To Stay Warm
